column4: I really feel lost becasue for over a month now Pidgin has not been working for me and nobody has been able to help me fix it ... even going through the bug reporting process did not help
I am forced to use Kopete in Ubuntu becasue Pidgin is broken ... and I REALLY want to use Pidgin ...
if you don't manage to fix it, you can try empathy. Gnome's moving that way anyhow.
